Type Property# toggleInspector

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+

```
static let toggleInspector: NSToolbarItem.Identifier
```

[`static let space: NSToolbarItem.Identifier`](/documentation/appkit/nstoolbaritem/identifier/space)The identifier for a toolbar item that displays an empty space with a standard fixed size.[`static let cloudSharing: NSToolbarItem.Identifier`](/documentation/appkit/nstoolbaritem/identifier/cloudsharing)The identifier for a toolbar item that tells your app to display the iCloud sharing
